minorg.pam module

class minorg.pam.PAM(pam='NGG', gRNA_length=20)[source]

Bases: object

__init__(pam='NGG', gRNA_length=20)[source]

pam: PAM object or str of PAM pattern (if PAM object provided, attributes are copied) gRNA_length: int length of gRNA (bp)

regex(gRNA_length: Optional[int] = None)[source]
